name: Google Real Estate Maps
author: RealEstate.ai

sections.description:
The Google Real Estate Maps plugin will create a Google Map populated with real estate listings from Google’s Real Estate index. Perfect plugin for real estate agents that need listing data.

Author

Joe Hall

Feedback & Support

http://realestate.ai/blog/43/google-real-estate-maps-wordpress-plugin/
sections.installation:
To install:

1) Using FTP, upload the entire google-realestate-maps folder into your wp-content/plugins folder like so: wp-content/plugins/google-realestate-maps/

2) Login to your admin panel and go to your plugins control panel and activate the Google Real Estate Maps Plugin

To configure:

1) Go to the Google Real Estate Maps settings page at: /wp-admin/tools.php?page=google-real-estate-map

2) Add a new map by inputting your city and state.

3) The height & width are optional fields. If left blank a default size will be set.

4) Click “SAVE THIS MAP”

5) Copy “insert code” and paste into pages and post where you want your maps to appear.
